title: XDA Basics: How to make a meme in 2022 so you can (try to) be funny
content:
Memes have become the language of the internet, and everyone is using them. It’s gotten to the point where it’s hard to define what a meme really is. Nowadays, memes can really be almost any image used in the right context. Any image used as a reaction to a specific situation can be a meme,

The post XDA Basics: How to make a meme in 2022 so you can (try to) be funny appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Want to make your friends laugh (or cringe)? Here's how to make a meme you can share on social media and anywhere you want.
